org.lightsleep.database

Class Standard

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightsleep.database.Standard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Database
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, SQLite, SQLServer

    public class Standard
extends java.lang.Object
implements Database
    A database handler that does not depend on the particular DBMS. The object of this class has a TypeConverter map with the following additional TypeConverter to TypeConverter.typeConverterMap.
    Registered TypeConverter objects
    Source data typeDestination data typeConversion Contents
    Clob StringThrows a ConvertException if the length exceeds Integer.MAX_VALUE.
    Throws a ConvertException if SQLException is thrown when getting content.
    Blob byte[]
    java.sql.Arrayboolean[] Converts each element to the data type of array element with TypeConverter.
    byte[]
    short[]
    int[]
    long[]
    float[]
    double[]
    BigDecimal[]
    String[]
    java.util.Date[]
    java.sql.Date[]
    Time[]
    Timestamp[]
    Boolean SqlStringfalse -> FALSE
    true -> TRUE
    Object '...'
    Character
    BigDecimal
    String '...'
    ? (SQL parameter) if long
    java.util.DateDATE'yyyy-MM-dd'
    java.sql.Date
    Time TIME'HH:mm:ss'
    Timestamp TIMESTAMP'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'
    Enum '...' (Using toString())
    byte[] X'...'
    ? (SQL parameter) if long
    boolean[] ARRAY[x,y,z,...]
    Convert each element to a SqlString with TypeConverter.
    char[]
    byte[][]
    short[]
    int[]
    long[]
    float[]
    double[]
    BigDecimal[]
    String[]
    java.util.Date[]
    java.sql.Date[]
    Time[]
    Timestamp[]
    Iterable (x,y,z,...)
    Convert each element to a SqlString with TypeConverter.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Masato Kokubo
    See Also:
    TypeConverter

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static TypeConverter<java.lang.Boolean,SqlString> booleanToSql01Converter
      TypeConverter object to convert from Boolean to SqlString (0 or 1)
      static int maxBinaryLiteralLength
      The maximum length of binary literal when creates SQL.
      If the binary literal exceeds this length, it generated as SQL parameters (?).
      The value of maxBinaryLiteralLength of lightsleep.properties has been set.
      static int maxStringLiteralLength
      The maximum length of string literal when creates SQL.
      If the string literal exceeds this length, it generated as SQL parameters (?).
      The value of maxStringLiteralLength of lightsleep.properties has been set.
      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,TypeConverter<?,?>> typeConverterMap

    • Field Detail

      • maxStringLiteralLength

        public static final int maxStringLiteralLength
        The maximum length of string literal when creates SQL.
        If the string literal exceeds this length, it generated as SQL parameters (?).
        The value of maxStringLiteralLength of lightsleep.properties has been set. (if undefined, 128)

      • maxBinaryLiteralLength

        public static final int maxBinaryLiteralLength
        The maximum length of binary literal when creates SQL.
        If the binary literal exceeds this length, it generated as SQL parameters (?).
        The value of maxBinaryLiteralLength of lightsleep.properties has been set. (if undefined, 128)

      • booleanToSql01Converter

        protected static final TypeConverter<java.lang.Boolean,SqlString> booleanToSql01Converter
        TypeConverter object to convert from Boolean to SqlString (0 or 1)

      • typeConverterMap

        protected final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,TypeConverter<?,?>> typeConverterMap
